Pfizer mRNA 2 21 days apart 95% (â‰¥ 16 y/o)
100%(12-15 y/o) short-term mild-to-moderate pain at the injection site
fatigue, headache
AstraZeneca Viral Vector (non-replicating) 2 4-12 weeks apart 70.4% (vs. symptomatic COVID-19)
100%(vs. severe COVID-19) pain and tenderness at the injection site
fatigue, headache, feverishness, myalgia
Moderna mRNA 2 28 days apart 94.1% (vs. symptomatic COVID-19)
100%(vs. severe COVID-19) pain, erythema, swelling at the injection site
axillary lymphadenopathy
fever, headache, myalgia, arthralgia, nausea, vomiting, chills
Sinovac Inactivated virus 2 28 days apart 51% (vs. symptomatic COVID-19)
100%(vs. severe COVID-19) local lymphadenopathy at the injection site
allergic reaction (any component of the vaccine)
convulsion
Sputnik V Viral Vector (non-replicating) 2 3 weeks apart 91% (vs. symptomatic COVID-19)
100%(vs. moderate-to-severe COVID-19) pain at the injection site, hyperthemia, swelling
headache, asthenia, muscle/joint pain, malaise, sore throat, diarrhea, rhinorrhea, loss of apetite, pain in the oropharynx, nasal congestion, colds, sneezing, cough
Janssen Viral Vector (non-replicating) 1 - 66.1-66.9% (vs. moderate-to-severe/critical COVID-19)
100%(vs. severe COVID-19) - pain at the injection site, redness, swelling
tiredness, headache, muscle pain, chills, fever, nausea
Novavax Protein subunit 2 21 days apart 90% (vs. infection)
100%(vs. moderate-to-severe COVID-19) pain at the injection site, tenderness
fatigue, muscle pain, headache, malaise
Bharat Inactivated virus 2 28 days apart 80.6% (vs PCR-confirmed symptomatic COVID-19) headache, fever, fatigue, body ache, abdominal pain, nausea, vomiting
